title: Beeverse
description: Unity bee colony survival city building game.

title: RecipeShare
description: Cross-platform recipe sharing app built using React Native and Expo with a Supabase backend
Includes full CRUD functionality for managing recipes and cookbooks
Integrates Supabase user authentication to manage account access and sharing cookbooks between users
Key features: create and favourite recipes, organize them into cookbooks, and share those cookbooks with other users
Share collections of recipes at once via cookbooks
Favourite recipes shared with you to copy them to your personal collection

title: GryphHacks Website
description: React website for UoG's 2022 hackathon, GryphHacks.
